org.ardulink.legacy

Class Link

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardulink.legacy.Link
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Link.LegacyLinkAdapter
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class Link
extends java.lang.Object

    Ardulink

    v2.0.1 Phoenix

    An adapter for the old legacy link (Ardulink 1 compatibility issue). Users should migrate to new new API. project Ardulink http://www.ardulink.org/
